name: ai-online-assistant-fake-news-detector
description: A tool for identifying fake news articles.

scripts.install:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm audit fix
scripts.install:nn: cd nn_server && npm install && npm audit fix
scripts.install:coreNN: cd nn_server/core_nn && npm install && npm audit fix
scripts.install:adjectiveNN: cd nn_server/nn_adjective_input && npm install && npm audit fix
scripts.install:verboseNN: cd nn_server/nn_verbose_input && npm install && npm audit fix
scripts.install:spellingNN: cd nn_server/nn_spelling_input && npm install && npm audit fix
scripts.install:db: cd db_server && npm install && npm audit fix
scripts.install:api: cd api_server && npm install && npm audit fix

author: 5Bits
